          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Pofók árvacsalán</string>
            <string language="en-US">Balm-leaved red deadnettle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Balsam-leaved Rot deadnettle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deadnettle de rouge de Baume-leaved</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deadnettle do vermelho do balm-leaved-leaved</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deadnettle di colore rosso del Balsamo-leaved</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλσαμο-με φύλλα κόκκινο deadnettle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deadnettle del rojo del Ba'lsamo-leaved</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Pofók árvacsalán (Lamium orvala) hazánkban kizárólag néhány Dráva menti völgyben él</string>
            <string language="en-US">Balm-leaved red deadnettle exclusively lives in some valleys along the Drava</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növénytan</string>
            <string language="en-US">botany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">természetvédelem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">duna-dráva nemzeti park igazgatóság</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">védett faj</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">jellegzetes faj</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Balsam-leaved rotes deadnettle lebt 
ausschließlich in einigen Senken entlang dem Drava</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le deadnettle rouge de Baume-leaved vit 
exclusivement en quelques vallées le long du Drava</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O deadnettle vermelho do balm-leaved-leaved vive 
exclusivamente em alguns vales ao longo do Drava</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il deadnettle rosso del Balsamo-leaved 
esclusivamente vive in alcune valli lungo il Drava</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βάλσαμο-με φύλλα κόκκινο deadnettle ζει 
αποκλειστικά σε μερικές κοιλάδες κατά μήκος του Drava</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El deadnettle rojo del Ba'lsamo-leaved vive 
exclusivamente en algunos valles a lo largo del Drava</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Botanik</string>
          </keyword>
